name: ContMDiffSection.mk.inj
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H M
F : Type u_5
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F
n : WithTop ENat
V : M → Type u_6
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace (Bundle.TotalSpace F V)
inst✝¹ : (x : M) → TopologicalSpace (V x)
inst✝ : FiberBundle F V
toFun✝ : (x : M) → V x
contMDiff_toFun✝ : ContMDiff I (I.prod (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 F)) n fun x => Bundle.TotalSpace.mk' F x (toFun✝ x)

contMDiff_toFun : ContMDiff I (I.prod (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 F)) n fun x => Bundle.TotalSpace.mk' F x (toFun x)
x✝ : Eq { toFun := toFun✝, contMDiff_toFun := contMDiff_toFun✝ } { toFun := toFun, contMDiff_toFun := contMDiff_toFun }
⊢ Eq toFun✝ toFun
decl:
/-- Bundled `n` times continuously differentiable sections of a vector bundle.
Denoted as `Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯` within the `Manifold` namespace. -/
structure ContMDiffSection where
  /-- the underlying function of this section -/
  protected toFun : ∀ x, V x
  /-- proof that this section is `C^n` -/
  protected contMDiff_toFun : ContMDiff I (I.prod 𝓘(𝕜, F)) n fun x ↦
    TotalSpace.mk' F x (toFun x)

name: ContMDiffSection.coeFn_mk
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E

inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H M
F : Type u_5
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F
n : WithTop ENat
V : M → Type u_6
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace (Bundle.TotalSpace F V)
inst✝¹ : (x : M) → TopologicalSpace (V x)
inst✝ : FiberBundle F V
s : (x : M) → V x
hs : ContMDiff I (I.prod (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 F)) n fun x => { proj := x, snd := s x }
⊢ Eq (⇑{ toFun := s, contMDiff_toFun := hs }) s
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coeFn_mk (s : ∀ x, V x)
    (hs : ContMDiff I (I.prod 𝓘(𝕜, F)) n fun x => TotalSpace.mk x (s x)) :
    (mk s hs : ∀ x, V x) = s :=
  rfl

name: ContMDiffSection.contMDiff
initialProofState:

inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜

inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E

I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H

inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M

inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F

V : M → Type u_6

⊢ ContMDiff I (I.prod (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 F)) n fun x => Bundle.TotalSpace.mk' F x (s x)
decl:
protected theorem contMDiff (s : Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯) :
    ContMDiff I (I.prod 𝓘(𝕜, F)) n fun x => TotalSpace.mk' F x (s x : V x) :=
  s.contMDiff_toFun

name: ContMDiffSection.coe_inj
initialProofState:

decl:
theorem coe_inj ⦃s t : Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯⦄ (h : (s : ∀ x, V x) = t) : s = t :=
  DFunLike.ext' h

name: ContMDiffSection.coe_nsmul
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹³ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝¹² : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝¹¹ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝¹⁰ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁹ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁸ : ChartedSpace H M
F : Type u_5
inst✝⁷ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝⁶ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F
n : WithTop ENat
V : M → Type u_6
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace (Bundle.TotalSpace F V)
inst✝⁴ : (x : M) → TopologicalSpace (V x)
inst✝³ : FiberBundle F V
inst✝² : (x : M) → AddCommGroup (V x)
inst✝¹ : (x : M) → Module 𝕜 (V x)
inst✝ : VectorBundle 𝕜 F V
s : ContMDiffSection I F n V
k : Nat
⊢ Eq (⇑(HSMul.hSMul k s)) (HSMul.hSMul k ⇑s)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_nsmul (s : Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯) (k : ℕ) : ⇑(k • s : Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯) = k • ⇑s := by
  induction' k with k ih
  · simp_rw [zero_smul]; rfl
  simp_rw [succ_nsmul, ← ih]; rfl

name: ContMDiffSection.coe_zsmul
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹³ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝¹² : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝¹¹ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝¹⁰ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁹ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁸ : ChartedSpace H M
F : Type u_5
inst✝⁷ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝⁶ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F
n : WithTop ENat
V : M → Type u_6
inst✝⁵ : TopologicalSpace (Bundle.TotalSpace F V)
inst✝⁴ : (x : M) → TopologicalSpace (V x)
inst✝³ : FiberBundle F V
inst✝² : (x : M) → AddCommGroup (V x)
inst✝¹ : (x : M) → Module 𝕜 (V x)
inst✝ : VectorBundle 𝕜 F V
s : ContMDiffSection I F n V
z : Int
⊢ Eq (⇑(HSMul.hSMul z s)) (HSMul.hSMul z ⇑s)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_zsmul (s : Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯) (z : ℤ) : ⇑(z • s : Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯) = z • ⇑s := by
  cases' z with n n
  · refine (coe_nsmul s n).trans ?_
    simp only [Int.ofNat_eq_coe, natCast_zsmul]
  · refine (congr_arg Neg.neg (coe_nsmul s (n + 1))).trans ?_
    simp only [negSucc_zsmul, neg_inj]

r : 𝕜
s : ContMDiffSection I F n V
⊢ Eq (⇑(HSMul.hSMul r s)) (HSMul.hSMul r ⇑s)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_smul (r : 𝕜) (s : Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯) : ⇑(r • s : Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯) = r • ⇑s :=
  rfl

name: ContMDiffSection.mdifferentiable'
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H M
F : Type u_5
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F
n : WithTop ENat
V : M → Type u_6
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace (Bundle.TotalSpace F V)
inst✝¹ : (x : M) → TopologicalSpace (V x)
inst✝ : FiberBundle F V
s : ContMDiffSection I F n V
hn : LE.le 1 n
⊢ MDifferentiable I (I.prod (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 F)) fun x => Bundle.TotalSpace.mk' F x (s x)
decl:
protected theorem mdifferentiable' (s : Cₛ^n⟮I; F, V⟯) (hn : 1 ≤ n) :
    MDifferentiable I (I.prod 𝓘(𝕜, F)) fun x => TotalSpace.mk' F x (s x : V x) :=
  s.contMDiff.mdifferentiable hn

name: ContMDiffSection.mdifferentiable
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H M
F : Type u_5
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F
V : M → Type u_6
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace (Bundle.TotalSpace F V)
inst✝¹ : (x : M) → TopologicalSpace (V x)
inst✝ : FiberBundle F V
s : ContMDiffSection I F (↑Top.top) V
⊢ MDifferentiable I (I.prod (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 F)) fun x => Bundle.TotalSpace.mk' F x (s x)
decl:
protected theorem mdifferentiable (s : Cₛ^∞⟮I; F, V⟯) :
    MDifferentiable I (I.prod 𝓘(𝕜, F)) fun x => TotalSpace.mk' F x (s x : V x) :=
  s.contMDiff.mdifferentiable (mod_cast le_top)

name: ContMDiffSection.mdifferentiableAt
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
inst✝¹⁰ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
E : Type u_2
inst✝⁹ : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝⁸ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
H : Type u_3
inst✝⁷ : TopologicalSpace H
I : ModelWithCorners 𝕜 E H
M : Type u_4
inst✝⁶ : TopologicalSpace M
inst✝⁵ : ChartedSpace H M
F : Type u_5
inst✝⁴ : NormedAddCommGroup F
inst✝³ : NormedSpace 𝕜 F
V : M → Type u_6
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace (Bundle.TotalSpace F V)
inst✝¹ : (x : M) → TopologicalSpace (V x)
inst✝ : FiberBundle F V
s : ContMDiffSection I F (↑Top.top) V
x : M
⊢ MDifferentiableAt I (I.prod (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 F)) (fun x => Bundle.TotalSpace.mk' F x (s x)) x
decl:
protected theorem mdifferentiableAt (s : Cₛ^∞⟮I; F, V⟯) {x} :
    MDifferentiableAt I (I.prod 𝓘(𝕜, F)) (fun x => TotalSpace.mk' F x (s x : V x)) x :=
  s.mdifferentiable x
